message.entry: T and RULE must be the same size, or either one may be a scalar.
RULE must be an integer value, an array of integer values, or one of the following: ''next'', ''previous'', ''current'', or ''nearest''.
Day of week must be a number from 1 to 7, ''weekday'', ''weekend'', or a day name.
Ambiguous value for day of week: ''{0}''.
RULE must be ''next'', ''previous'', or ''nearest'' when shifting with ''weekday'' or ''weekend''.
A numeric RULE of 0 is not supported when shifting with ''weekday'' or ''weekend''.
DATESHIFT requires at least 3 arguments. Specify a datetime array, a rule for shifting elements of the array, and a time unit.
